tooltip: Generates a summary report indicating how many of your SNPs are found in various categories of genomic features.
Use this tool to remove SNPs which are already known and/or which fall within custom regions-of-interest.
Use this tool to only keep SNPs which are already known and/or which fall within custom regions-of-interest.
This tool will automatically annotate your SNPs based on whether they are known SNPs, fall within certain interesting genomic features, and whether they cause a synonymous/non-synonymous change.
